attributes.action: reinstate Professor David Nutt and heed his advice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He was sacked from his job as the Chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs, for criticizing the Governments policy and for trying to get the Government to tell the truth.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
